      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g,
          float alpha)
        Renders the menu on a Graphics object
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object to draw on
        alpha - 1 if all ticks for second are done, 0 if none is done, 0.5 if half etc.
